name: Jumpy's
description:
Jumpy's a puzzle 2D game.
use swipes and constant swipes to move Jumpy's in the puzzle and make your way to retrieve enough candies to open the portal.

take as many as you can as fast as you can to score more stars.

Jumpy's a challenging and fun, sometimes it will be easy to pass, sometimes it will need more strategic way to solve.

be quick with your mind, hands and solve it.
